info.name: Amork App
info.description:
Complete API collection for Amork Food Order mobile app (Flutter)

Features:
- Authentication (Login, Register, Google OAuth)
- Categories Management (CRUD)
- Foods Management (CRUD)
- Cart Operations
- Order Management
- Payment Processing
- User Profile (CRUD)
- Notifications
- Reviews & Ratings
- Analytics
- Promotions

item.name: üîê Authentication
item.description: User authentication endpoints including login, register, and OAuth

request.description: Register a new user account with email, password, full name, and phone number
Login with email and password to get authentication token
Logout current user and invalidate token
Verify user email with verification code

item.name: üìÇ Categories
item.description: CRUD operations for food categories (Food, Drink, Snack, Dessert)

request.description: Retrieve all categories (Food, Drink, Snack, Dessert)
Get specific category details by ID
Get all items in a specific category with pagination

item.name: üçΩÔ∏è Foods/Items
item.description: CRUD operations for food items across all categories

request.description: Get all food items with pagination and filters
Get popular/trending food items for main page
Get detailed information about a specific food item

body.raw:
{
    "food_name": "Cambodia Fish Amork",
    "category_id": 1,
    "description": "Traditional Cambodian fish dish with coconut cream",
    "price": 6.00,
    "original_price": 12.00,
    "calories": 350,
    "cooking_time": "25 min",
    "image_url": "fish_amork.jpg",
    "rating": 4.8,
    "is_popular": true,
    "is_available": true,
    "ingredients": [
        {
            "name": "Fish",
            "quantity": "200g",
            "is_required": true
        }
    ],
    "additional_ingredients": [
        {
            "name": "Extra Fish",
            "price": 1.50
        }
    ],
    "tags": ["traditional", "spicy", "popular"]
}

request.description: Add a new food item with ingredients and original price

body.raw:
{
    "food_name": "Cambodia Fish Amork - Updated",
    "price": 6.50,
    "original_price": null,
    "description": "Traditional Cambodian fish dish with rich coconut cream",
    "is_available": true,
    "rating": 4.9
}

request.description: Search for food items by name or description
Get current user's cart with all items
Add food item to cart with quantity and additional ingredients
Update quantity or ingredients of item in cart
Calculate total price of all items in cart
Create new order from cart items

query.description: pending, confirmed, preparing, ready, delivered, cancelled

request.description: Get user's order history with filters
Get detailed information about a specific order
Cancel an order (only if status is pending or confirmed)
Register device token for push notifications
Get all active promotions and offers
Validate coupon code and get discount amount
Get reviews for a specific food item
Submit a review for a food item
Get spending summary for a date range
Get app configuration (delivery fee, tax rate, etc.)
Report an issue with order or app
